ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` G ) = ( norm ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` G ) = ( -g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isngp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. MetSp /\ ( ( norm ` G ) o. ( -g ` G ) ) C_ ( dist ` G ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simp2bi | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. MetSp ) |
